title: How to get access?
subtitle:
In order to gain access, you must purchase 1 of 3 subscriptions.
 You can also try a free 7-day trial.

community.title: Cryptocommunity
community.subtitle: Get access to a private community in Discord and Telegram for real crypto enthusiasts. You will always be aware of the events of the crypto industry! Regular conferences, active communication, and a lot of useful materials will not let you get bored

item1.title: Training
item1.description: Here you will find analysis of markets / portfolios, conferences, discussions of strategies, and secrets of the modern market. The community also hosts regular live lectures from our experts. You will have the opportunity to ask any questions you may have

item2.title: Analytics
item2.description: We monitor and create a daily analytical summary of the most important market metrics. You will learn about the current situation and receive recommendations on asset purchases and position sets

item3.title: Crypto News
item3.description: We track and collect real-time news from the world of cryptocurrencies in one place for you (Twitter & Binance Tracker)

item4.title: Community
item4.description: Guaranteed support and personal pieces of advice. Friendly and responsive environment, comfortable atmosphere, active communication, and also feedback

item5.title: Library
item5.description: A unique and regularly updated collection of the most useful resources in the crypto industry for all occasions: CEX, DEX, Wallets, Analytics... (over 100 resources)

item6.title: Whale Alert
item6.description: We track, sort, and publish large transactions related to the movement, burning, and minting of digital assets so that you always keep abreast

platform.title: Platform
platform.subtitle: Track the performance of your investments, learn with engaging courses and share experiences in one convenient place
platform.notice: We are constantly working on improving the platform and strive to make it as convenient and useful as possible for everyone. More cool features coming soon!

item1.title: Portfolio
item1.description: Track the performance of your portfolios in an intuitive interface with three types of portfolios: stock, virtual, and venture

item2.title: Forum
item2.description: Communicate with soulmates, create posts about the cryptosphere, share impressions and experiences, discuss, comment and vote for the best ideas

item3.title: Academy
item3.description: Upgrade your knowledge of blockchain and cryptocurrencies with our educational courses. You will find a lot of useful information and helpful animations. Start learning about complex things in a simple manner and get achievements!

item4.title: Profile
item4.description: Evolve your character, collect daily rewards and get unique achievements for being active

nft.title: Unique NFT Hamsters for true dusters!
nft.description:
For the first 10,000 subscribers, we've made a historic promotion! When you
 subscribe to Cryptocommunity or All in one for the first time, you
 will receive a unique Hamster NFT. access to future products and
 company events.

hamster_modal.description: You can only create a hamster with the subscription name “Cryptocommunity” or “All in One”. The generated hamster is permanently assigned to you. Each hamster has a rarity from Common to Rare and unique generation properties: Background, Emote, Thing, Headgear

step1.title: Step 1
step1.description: Connect your discord account to the profile

step2.title: Step 2
step2.description: Go to Dust Foundation Discord and verify

step3.title: Step 3
step3.description: Open the “Generation” channel in the “Community” section

step5.title: Step 5
step5.description: Congratulations, your coolest hamster has been generated!

subscriptions.title: Our Subscriptions
subscriptions.tabs_notification: Subscribe for {{ term }} days and get {{ bonus_term }} days free!
